mlb: MLB stands for Major League Baseball which means professional sports organization of baseball. MLB shoes are a Korean brand, inspired by baseball, this is also a new trend, created from the perfect combination of many modern fashion elements.
vans: Vans is an American fashion brand specializing in skate shoes, clothing and accessories, founded in Anaheim, California and owned by VF Corporation.
nb: Founded in 1906, New Balance is one of the world's oldest athletic shoe companies. Known for the quality and enhanced branding in its running shoe line, the brand has maintained the love of millions of customers over the decades.
